description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defy Gravity is an action platformer that is a mix between Super Mario style platforming, Braid and Portal 2d. Kara, our heroine, has access to a unique gameplay mechanic that she uses to manipulate the world around her.  Kara has a gun that is able to alter the laws of physics through the creation of pockets of gravity and anti-gravity.
